entries.title: Corporate America lobbies up in support of same-sex marriage
entries.description: Businesses are pushing for passage of legislation to add same-sex and interracial marriage protections into law.

entries.title: Abrams’ campaign chair collected millions in legal fees from voting rights organization
entries.description: Fair Fight Action, the nonprofit founded by Abrams, paid her close friend and ally’s law firm $9.4 million in 2019 and 2020, with two more years of billing yet to be disclosed.
